summary:
Allows the crafting of various monk robes and colors
NEW! Different color hoods
NOW! With optional clothing addon
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][size=4]FUTURE DEVELOPMENTS[/size][/color]
[list]
[*] Hand 2 Hand combat scaling with level
[/list]

[color=red][size=4]VERSION[/size][/color]
[color=ffbbbb]OPTIONAL[/color] - Added Optional Clothing seperate file, include alot of clothes that strays away from the life of a monk
[color=#40FF40]1.4[/color] - Added Red / Brown / Blue / Green / Grey / Gold standalone hoods + Meshes
[color=#40FF40]1.3[/color] - Added Unenchanted versions of Thalmor Gloves / Boots / Robe & Hooded Version / Mystic Dawn Gloves / Boots / Robe & Hooded Version
[color=#40FF40]1.2[/color] - Added Black Robe, Brown Monk Robe & Hooded Variants / Black Hood, Fixed boots & added black pair / Added College Robes / Mage Hoods
[color=#40FF40]1.1[/color] - Requires Tanning-Rack to craft the robes, added non-hooded variants and a new robe Grey Hooded and Grey Non Hooded
[color=#40FF40]1.0[/color] - Initial Release

[color=red][size=4]DESCRIPTION[/size][/color]
Allows the player to craft Monk-Hooded & Non Hooded robes of thier choosing. In order to craft these items, special skill ranks are required 
[list]
[*] Monk clothing requires - [b]Restoration Novice[/b]
[*] Thalmor clothing requires - [b]Destruction Novice[/b]
[*] Mystic Dawn requires - [b]Alteration Novice[/b]
[/list]

Requires [b]Linen Wraps[/b] / [b]Alchemy Ingredients[/b] / [b]Charcoal[/b] for the dye.
Let me know what you guys want to see in this because ill be adding on to this when i can

[color=red][size=4]INSTALL[/size][/color]
Like all [b]ESP[/b] files they go into your [i]Skyrim/Data[/i] folder, with all mods you download please backup your save file

[color=red][size=4]MOD CONFLICTS[/size][/color]
None that i know of, if you have problems please let me know and ill add it to the list

[color=red][size=4]NOTE\'s FROM THE AUTHOR[/size][/color]
[list]
[*] Previous pictures show using the forge to craft the items, this is now obsolete because it now requires the Tanning-Rack
[*] If you find this mod of use and you like it, please [color=red][b]TAG[/b][/color] and [color=red][b]ENDORSE[/b][/color], thank you
[/list]
author: PROXiCiDE

files.name: WayOfTheMonk_1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Added Grey Monk Robe & Non Hooded Variant
Added Non Hooded Monk Robes for the previous released robes
Now requires Tanning Rack to craft

files.name: WayOfTheMonk_1_2
files.changelogHtml:
Added a Black Hood
Added College Robes & Mage Hood Variants
Added Black Robe, Brown Monk Robe & Hooded Variants
Added Optional Clothing (Seperate Download) contains alot of clothing items

files.name: WayOfTheMonk_1_3
files.changelogHtml:
Added Unenchanted versions of Thalmor Gloves / Boots / Robe & Hooded Version / Mystic Dawn Gloves / Boots / Robe & Hooded Version
Monk clothing requires - Restoration Novice
Thalmor clothing requires - Destruction Novice
Mystic Dawn requires - Alteration Novice

files.name: WayOfTheMonk_1_4
files.changelogHtml:
New colored hoods have there own meshes
Added some pictures on the page
Added Red / Blue / Green / Grey / Brown / Gold standalone hoods
